abstract: ABSTRACT Land Snail Diplommatina spp (Mollusc, Gastropoda) at Ciremai Mountain National Park. The microscopies of land snail Diplommatinids depend on the water resources. This member of mollusc can be used as a forest indicator. The results of the study shown that 50% Javan Diplommatinids found in this park. The study also indicated that Palatungan, Linggarjati and Apuy (Argamukti) has Shannon and Weiner diversity: 1.33, 0.85, and 0.84, respectively. Key words: Diplommatina, Mollusc, TN. G. Ciremai
